H0.text: What did Arthur Wynne invent. Crossword Puzzle Alternative

H1.text: What did Arthur Wynne invent. Word Game

H2.text: What did Arthur Wynne invent. Anagram Puzzle

H3.text: What did Arthur Wynne invent. Xword

A4.text: On December 21, 1913, Arthur Wynne, a journalist born in Liverpool, England, published a 'word-cross' puzzle in the New York World that embodied most of the features of the modern genre.

A5.text: This puzzle is frequently cited as the first crossword puzzle, and Wynne as the inventor.
